### Tender Announcement for Ion Milling Machine

#### Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice

**Reference Number**: 23-58142
**Solicitation Number**: 23-58142
**Publication Date**: 2023-10-30
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-14T14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: 2023-11-14

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of an ion milling machine with an integrated transfer system.

**Background**:
The NRC requires a high-precision ion milling machine to support its research in advanced metallography analysis using optical microscopy and scanning electron microscopy (SEM) in the aluminum processing sector. The machine must be capable of milling samples with extreme accuracy and reproducing metallographic preparation of various alloys of high-value-added components.

**Technical Specifications**:
The tender requires the supply, transportation, installation, documentation, and training of an ion milling machine that meets the following specifications:

*   Operating with a minimum of 99.999% pure argon gas.
*   Accelerating voltage between 0 and 8 kV.
*   Capable of operating in two modes: flat milling and cross-sectioning at ambient temperature and -100°C.
*   Dimensions: maximum dimensions of 619 x 736 x 312 mm (L x W x H).
*   Airtight sample holder compatible with the Hitachi SU-70 SEM.
*   Operating software and remote operation capability.

**Deliverables**:
The successful bidder must provide the following:

*   One (1) ion milling machine with one (1) integrated transfer system.
*   Installation for commissioning within 30 business days.
*   Eight (8) hours of training on the use of the equipment.
*   Operations documents.

**Contact Information**:
Contact person: Jonathan Soles
Title: Contracting Authority
Telephone: 343-548-9258
Email: [Jonathan.Soles@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:jonathan.soles@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**:
The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is November 14th, 2023 at 2:00 pm EDT.
